title: Five-Star Colombia Bliss with Infinity Pool Overlooking the Caribbean Sea
description: Experience the magic of Colombia's Caribbean coast with a stay at the five-star InterContinental Cartagena De Indias, an IHG hotel. Ideally located in the heart of the city, the Bocagrande district, this modern oasis offers breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. Listen to live local music as you feast on tapas at Kanuu Restaurant and unwind in the infinity pool overlooking the glittering sea. When you're ready to explore, you're just a short stroll from the city's UNESCO World Heritage-listed Old Town, renowned for its colonial architecture.
location_description: InterContinental Cartagena de Indias, an IHG Hotel
